General.Name: Evergreen Marine Corp Taiwan Ltd
General.Description: Evergreen Marine Corporation (Taiwan) Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in marine transportation, shipping agency, commercial port area ship area, and distribution of containers services in Taiwan, the America, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company provides cargo loading and discharging services; invests in transportation-related business, and counter yards and port terminals; terminal services; and security services, manufacturing of dry steel containers and parts, and storage, repair, and cleaning of containers. It also offers inland transportations, real estate leasing, management consultancy and self-owned property leasing, and computer system services. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 166, Minsheng East Road, Taipei, Taiwan
